title: As a DPL user I want to be able to call an endpoint in ebis which returns all players eligible in the current draft who require consent.
custom_steps: DPL would prefer to get a full list of players that require consent rather than having to call for each year's list.  To provide this, we'll add a second endpoint: consentrequired/ the response type will be identical to the consentrequired/\{year} endpoint, however the population will include all players who require consent and are currently eligible or pending eligible for the current draft year's draft.  AC:* a new DPL endpoint /dpl/consentrequired/ exists* The new endpoint returns all eligible or pending eligible players for the current draft year's draft who require consent* The endpoint returns a list of objects with playerId, orgId, and consentYear properties

title: As a User, I want the Rookie Threshold Calc updated
custom_steps: Currently, the rookie calculation is:_A player shall be considered a rookie unless, during a previous season or seasons, he had (a) exceeded 130 at-bats or 50 innings pitched in the Major Leagues; or (b) accumulated more than 45 days on the active roster of a Major League Club or Clubs during the period of the 26-player limit (excluding time on the Injured List)._* Given that we were without September call-ups this season, days of service on the Major League roster will +i++*nclude September 2020*+. Thus, any player who accumulated more than +*45 days on the active roster of a Major League Club or Clubs during the entire 2020 regular season or during previous seasons prior to September 1st will no longer be considered a rookie in 2021.*+* 2020 ROY Winners (Kyle Lewis and Devin WIlliams) will not be eligible to repeat as winners in 2021, should they otherwise qualify for consideration.The definition shall be updated as follows:* Any player who did not win 2020 ROY Award (Kyle Lewis and Devin WIlliams) will maintain their rookie status in 2021 if, during a previous season or seasons, they have (a) not exceeded 130 at-bats or 50 innings pitched in the Major Leagues; and (b) not accumulated more than 45 days on the active roster of a Major League Club or Clubs during the period of the 28-player limit (excluding time on the Injured List) used for most of the 2020 season or during previous seasons prior to September 1st

title: Tech Debt - Remove old Drupal search types from db
custom_preconds:
Remove the old ebis_as_drupal_searches table and any of the ebis_as_type rows associated with it. This table was previously used to distinguish angular search types from drupal search types, but since drupal search types are no longer used, we can delete them and fix the query that filters them out of the angular search types.

This is a priority for the ebis postgres migration, since we don't want to bring over old tables and want to keep the db2 data and pg data aligned so that we can validate the pg data against db2.

This will affect the endpoint we use to populate the “Search For” dropdown on the advanced search page and that will probably need regression testing from this change

title: As a a User, I want to see the Development List Reinstatement Date populated on the Inactive List widget
custom_steps: AC:* When a player is placed on the Development List, the Reinstatement Date from the transaction will appear in the Earliest Reinstatement column of the "Players on Inactive List‰Û� widget

title: As a user I want to see the earliest reinstatement date on the Development List transaction
custom_steps: The players earliest reinstatement from the development list should be displayed on the transaction and should be correctly calculated to be 7 days from their placement date.BOC users can update the date, if necessaryAC* Development list transaction has a new 'Earliest Reinstatement date" field* The value is calculated as 7 days from the placement date* The Reinstatement Date will be editable by BOC Admin Users* The date displayed here should be used on the reinstate from IL transaction to determine if the player has spent enough time on the list (in case BOC changes the value)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want time spent on the Dev List to count towards 4th Option requirement
custom_steps: AC:* Time on the DEVEL List will count the same as if on the Active List and will count toward the 90 day requirement for a season of service for the 4th option.* Treat this as a TI transaction (service wise) + the above 4th Option* Option Tracking Batch and/or Seasons of Service Batch

title: Update R5 Eligible Batch for Replacement Players
custom_steps: Description:Replacement players should not become Rule 5 Eligible when they are selected to the MJ Roster.AC: - The R5 Eligible Batch will be updated to ensure players who are selected to the MJ Roster as replacement players do not have their R5 Eligibility affected by their selection

title: As a BOC user I want a "Replacement Player" checkbox added to the Minor Outright (MNOUT) transaction for "Replacement Players"
custom_steps: If a player is selected to MJ roster as a "Replacement Player" they can be sent back down to the minor leagues via the MJ Outright transaction without consequences.  To facilitate this, if the player is a replacement player a "Return of Replacement Player" checkbox will be added to the MN Outright transaction.  Only BOC can check the box, however it will be visible to club users.  If the box is visible it is required for submission.  It should not be required when it is not visible.  When the box is checked the player does not need to pass through waivers and therefore the consent, contemplated outright form, minor league service, and waiver rule checks should be skipped for submission and approval.AC:* An MN Outright for a player who is flagged as a replacement player will display a "Return of Replacement Player" checkbox.  Unchecked by default and editable only by BOC users.  The checkbox is required for submission/approval* When the Replacement Player checkbox is checked, the written consent, contemplated outright and waiver rules are not checked* Upon approval of an MN Outright with the checkbox checked, the player will no longer be flagged as a replacement player (PRO_PLAYER.REPLACEMENT_FLAG)* If the checkbox is checked the transaction bulletin entry for the MN Outright will say "Return of Replacement Player"* If the checkbox is checked the player history entry for the MN Outright will say "Return of Replacement Player"* An MN Outright for a player who is NOT flagged as a replacement player will work as normal and will not display or require that the Replacement Player checkbox be checked.

title: As a club user I want to receive an error when attempting to move a replacement player off of my clubs 40 man roster
custom_steps: Players who were selected to the major league roster cannot be optioned or traded.  If a club user attempts to submit either of those transactions for a replacement player they will receive an error message "This player was a replacement player and cannot be \[Optioned|Traded]"AC* An error fires for club users when submitting an option transaction for a replacement player* An error fires for club users when submitting an outright (trade) which includes at least one replacement player

title: As a user I want players who are selected as replacement players to appear in bold on the club player pools widget
custom_steps: If player is selected to the major league roster as a replacement player they should display in bold on the club player pools widget.AC* A player selected to the major league roster as a replacement player displays in bold on the club player pools widget in bold.* A footnote underneath the Major League Active Roster will explain what the bolded players mean.** Footnote will read ‰ÛÏBold indicates replacment player‰Û�Developer note: the PRO_PLAYER.REPLACEMENT_FLAG will be set by the transaction for this purpose

title: As a BOC user I want a "Replacement Player" checkbox added to the Selection to Major League Roster transaction
custom_steps: For the 2021 season, non 40 man roster players can be added to the active major league roster as "replacement players".  They will be active players and receive service as they normally would, however they can be sent back down (covered in a PIVOTAL-810) without going through waivers or being treated as an outrighted player.AC* There will be a new checkbox on the MJSEL transaction labeled: "Replacement Player"* The box will only be editable by BOC users* The box will be visible to club users, but disabled* If the box is checked, the PRO_PLAYER.REPLACEMENT_FLAG field will be set to 1* If the box is checked, the transaction bulletin entry for the selection will say: "Selection to Major League Roster as Replacement Player from <club> to <MJ club>"* If the box is checked, the line item in the player history widget for the selection will say: "Selection to Major League Roster as Replacement Player"

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want MN Viral Infection 60 Day IL Placements to count against 40-Man
custom_steps: Description: Normally, any Optioned player placed on a MN 60-Day IL continues to count against the 40-man roster.  In 2020, due to COVID, they did not count against the 40-man.  Moving forward, Viral Infection placements should be the only ones that stop counting against the 40-man.AC: - If an Optioned player is placed on the MN 60-Day IL with an ailment of "Viral Infection," they should not count against the 40-man roster - All other Optioned Players placed on the MN 60-Day IL will count against the 40 man, as in 2019 - The player will resume counting against the 40-man when they are reinstated from the IL.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want 7 Day at Complex Minimum to Apply to Transfer of Option Players
custom_steps: Related to https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-776  (did not include Transfer of Option players)AC: - Players on Option transferred to the Complex team must be remain there for a minimum of 7 days - Allow less than 7 days if:  -- Player is selected or recalled to the ML Club  -- Player is replacing a player placed on the IL, TI, or other inactive list subsequent to his transfer  -- Other intervening change in circumstances occurs and BOC allows transfer  -- Club will be able to select a Player to Replace where applicable (similar to Recall before 10 days logic)

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want "COVID" IL placements to be obvious on the TX Bulletin
custom_steps: AC:* When placing a player on the 60-day IL (Major) with an Ailment of "Viral Infection," the MJ Transaction Bulletin should read "Place on Injured List - Earliest Reinstatement Date MM/DD/YYYY‰Û� instead of "Place on 60-day IL (Major) - Earliest Reinstatement Date MM/DD/YYYY"* The Player History entry will be consistent with this

title: As a User, I want Reversing a Declare MN FA Tx to Unexpire Add C
custom_steps: Description: We recently implemented a change to update the status of Addendum Cs to Expired when their parent MNC expired.AC: - When a BOC User reverses or reverses & suppresses a Declare MN FA transaction, any Addendum Cs that were expired as a result of that transactions

title: As a User, I want to place players on Rehab at the Alternate Site
custom_steps: Related to https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-774AC: - 3A players may be placed on rehab at the Alt Site - Alt Site MN Players may be placed on rehab at the Alt Site - There will be no limit to how many of these players may be on rehab at the Alt Site at one time

title: Alternate Site Updates
custom_steps: AC:1.	Create a new AAA league for the alternate site ‰ÛÏAlternate Site‰Û�2.     Change Alt Site LOP to AAA3.	Add an ALTERNATE_SITE_FLAG field to the club_view and club_all_view4.	Use the alternate_site_flag on the club player pools to determine who is at the alternate site5.	Do not show alternate sites on addendum c in the salary section (screen and printed)

title: As a BOC user I want the warning displayed when transactions are created between 11PM and 9AM to fire on create
custom_steps: Currently the "You are entering this transaction near the time when the default Assignment Date will change.  Please confirm the date is accurate for this transaction." warning displays upon submission of the transaction.  It should ALSO fire upon creation of the transaction as well.AC* Warning is displayed upon creation of a transaction* Warning is displayed upon submission of a transaction

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Road Trip (Catcher at Home) Taxi Squad Reason split into two Reasons
custom_steps: Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788833/Data+Discovery+-+Taxi+Squad|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788833/Data+Discovery+-+Taxi+Squad]AC:* Currently, "Road Trip (Catcher at Home) is one Reason for placement on the Taxi Squad widget* This will be split out into two reasons:** Road Trip** Catcher at Home

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a Taxi Squad column added to the Alternate Training Site widget of the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_steps: Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/597196852/Data+Discovery+-+Club+Player+Pools+Utility|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/597196852/Data+Discovery+-+Club+Player+Pools+Utility]AC:* Change title of "Replacement" column to "Taxi Squad"* This column will no longer be editable by any user* The system will automatically display a check mark if the player is currently assigned to the Taxi Squad** If the box is checked, the player will not count towards the Alternate Site List Active count* The system will automatically remove the check mark when the player is removed from the Taxi Squad** Status of ‰Û÷Closed‰Ûª is considered removed from Taxi Squad

title: As a User I want to see a new Domestic Reserve column on the minor league roster widget
custom_steps: The minor league roster widget on the rosters page should have a new column to the right of the mn contract years column indicating whether or not the player counts against the domestic reserve count.AC* Minor League Roster has a new Domestic Reserve column* Players who are counting against the domestic reserve count will appear with a checkmark* Players who are NOT counting against the domestic reserve count will appear blank* Clicking on the column header will sort the widget by whether or not the players count against the limit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the system to generate a notification if a Club exceeds the Org Roster Limit
custom_steps: AC:* If a Club exceeds the Domestic Roster Limit (190 or 180, depending on time of year), the system will generate a clipboard notification for both the Club and the BOC* The notification will state the Org has violated the limit and give the limit and actual values.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Updates made to the 40-Man Players (Non-Club Player Pool) and Other Exempt Players Portion of the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_steps: Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/597196852/Data+Discovery+-+Club+Player+Pools+UtilityAC:The player population of the 40-Man Players (Non-Club Player Pool) and Other Exempt Players will be updated to the following: - MAJOR roster status is Designated for Assignment, Not Yet Reported, Disqualified, Ineligible, Military Leave, Restricted, Voluntarily Retired, Suspended, 60 Day ILOR - MAJOR roster status is Optioned AND player is on the alternate site AND MINOR roster status is one of: Disqualified, Ineligible, Military Leave, Restricted, Voluntarily Retired, 60 Day ILOR - Player is not on the MJ roster AND player is on the alternate site AND MINOR Roster status is one of: Disqualified, Ineligible, Military Leave, Restricted, Voluntarily Retired, 60 Day IL - Minor League 60-Day IL (assigned to Alt. Site)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Updates made to the Alternate Training Site Portion of the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_steps: Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/597196852/Data+Discovery+-+Club+Player+Pools+UtilityAC:The player population logic of the Alternate Training Site widget will be updated to - MAJOR Roster status in: Bereavement List, Paternity List, Restricted/Assigned, 7 Day Concussion IL, 10 Day IL, Rehab 10 Day IL (assigned to Alt. Site), Rehab 60 Day IL (assigned to Alt. Site), Rehab 7 Day Concussion IL (assigned to Alt. Site), Minor League 7-Day IL (assigned to Alt. Site), Rehab 7 Day IL (assigned to Alt. Site), Rehab Minor League 60-Day IL (assigned to Alt. Site), Optioned (assigned to Alt. Site)OR - MAJOR Roster status is Optioned (without service) +AND+ Player‰Ûªs MINOR club is the alternate site AND MINOR roster status is NOT one of: Disqualified, Ineligible, Military Leave, Restricted, Voluntarily Retired, 60 Day ILåÊ - Minor League Roster Status is assigned to Alternate Training Site (Active Status will count towards the Alt Site Active List, all others do not)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Updates made to the Club Totals Portion of the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_steps: Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/597196852/Data+Discovery+-+Club+Player+Pools+UtilityAC: - In the Club Totals Section:  -- Rename 'Active List' to 'ML Active List'  -- Rename 'Player Pool' to 'Alternate Site Active List'  -- Change definition of 'Alternate Site Active List' to be a count of the total active players in the Alternate Training Site section, excluding: Players currently on the ML taxi squad, any player on the ML or MiL IL, any player on rehab for any IL at Alt Site or restricted/assigned players at Alt Site, Not Yet Reported, Bereavement List, Paternity List)  -- Change definition of Tier 1 count to include ML Taxi Squad Players

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to Approve a submitted Award Bonus Package
custom_steps: AC:* BOC MJC Admin Users will see a clipboard notification when a new Award Bonus Package is submitted* The notification will have a hyperlink to the Package* The Package will have an Approve, a Reject, an Edit, and a Cancel button* Clicking Edit will load the Package in edit mode* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm** Confirming will return the user to their entry point** Declining will dismiss the modal* Clicking Approve will prompt the user to confirm** Declining will dismiss the modal** Confirming will:** Update status to Active** Generate a blue success notification** Generate a clipboard notification for the submitting user that their package was approved (there will be a hyperlink to the package)* Clicking Reject will prompt the user to confirm** Declining will dismiss the modal** Confirming will:** Update status to Rejected** Generate a blue success notification** Generate a clipboard notification for the submitting user that their package was rejected (there will be a hyperlink to the package)** Club users will be able to edit and resubmit Rejected packages

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to submit an Award Bonus Package to BOC
custom_steps: Wire: [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_package|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_package]AC:* There will be a 'Submit to BOC' button on unsaved and Preliminary Award Bonus Packages* Clicking the button will prompt the user to confirm their action* If they decline, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the package* If they confirm: ** Package will reload to View mode** Status will update to 'Pending Approval'** Blue success notification will be displayed** A Clipboard notification will be generated for MJC BOC Admins** Once submitted, Club users my no longer make updates to the package

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want to Create a New Award Bonus Package
custom_steps: Wires: - https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=award_bonus_packages - https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=create_new_award_bonus_packageData Discovery: - https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1327530051/Data+Discovery+-+Award+Bonus+Packages - https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3783826/MJC+-+Award+BonusesAC: - MJC Admin users will see a Create New button on the Award Bonus Package widget - Clicking the button will load a new, blank Award Bonus Package - The new Package will match the provided data discovery and wire  -- Clicking 'add new' label will launch a modal to add a new label name (functions the same way on contract language - Adding the clause criteria will function the same as the Award Bonus section on a MJC  -- All clauses will be for "All" years - There will be Save and Cancel buttons - Clicking Save, prior to submission, will save the package as preliminary - Clicking Cancel, will prompt the user to confirm their action  -- Confirming will close the package w/o saving any data and return the user to their entry point  -- Not confirming will close the modal

title: As a MJC User, I want to see a new Award Bonus Package widget
custom_steps: Wire: https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=award_bonus_packagesData Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1327136808/Data+Discovery+-+Award+Bonus+Packages+widgetAC: - Under the Major Contracts Dashboard / Left Nav, there will be a new Award Bonus Packages tab  -- This will be the last tab on the dashboard - There will be a Award Bonuses Package widget on the tab - The tab will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As a User I want the Trade Summary report to display three way trades
custom_steps: From EBISII-17147 - The Trade Summary report is currently only able to handle trades between two clubs and needs to be updated to handle three (or even four) way trades.  See the referenced Jira for some examples.AC:* All information from a three way trade displays correctly on the trade summary report* All information from a simple two way trade displays correctly on the trade summary reportNote: we may need to redesign the report layout on this in order to accommodate this request

title: MNC Prints without Dollars on $0 Living Allowance
custom_steps: At least on the first-year international side, when a club includes CEP language in the player's terms, if they select the entirety of the CEP money be allocated to tuition (so $0.00 in living allowance), the contract will print that as "$200,000 in tuition and $.00 in living allowance."It would be great if that could say "$0.00" - it prints perfectly if living allowance is greater than 0.Hans Montero (NYY) is an example: !image-2021-02-02-11-21-28-998.png|thumbnail!  !image-2021-02-02-11-22-51-766.png|thumbnail!

title: As an MNC Admin, I do not want the Release Clause table to print when Clubs include Custom Language
custom_steps: AC: - Currently when a Club chooses Custom Language for Release Clause on an MNC, the table prints with the contract - When Custom Language is chosen, the table should not print with the contract.  Only what is included in the Custom Language section should print. - The table should continue printing when standard language is chosen

title: Replacement Players Should Not Have Prior Outright Flag Set
custom_steps:
Related to https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-810

Currently, when a replacement player is returned to the Minors, their Prior Outright flag is being set.

That flag should not be set for replacement players.

title: Replace Players on Club Player Pool widget should have whole row bolded
custom_steps:
related to PIVOTAL-808

Currently, when a replacement player appears on the Club Player Pool utility, their name is bolded.

Their entire row should be bolded (to be consistent with player bolding on roster widgets)

title: Remove Earliest Reinstatement Date from Bulletin for COVID IL Placement
custom_steps:
Related to PIVOTAL-820.

When placing a player on the 60-day IL (Major) with an Ailment of "Viral Infection," the MJ Transaction Bulletin is currently reading "Place on Injured List - Earliest Reinstatement Date MM/DD/YYYY” 
 -Please remove the Earliest Reinstatement date so the entry reads "Place on Injured List"

The Player History entry will be consistent with this as well

title: Increase Number of Coaches From 8 to 9
custom_steps:
Currently, Club users may select up to 8 coaches to appear on the MJ Roster through the Employee Roster widget.

This needs to be increased to 9 coaches.  The number of coaches should also be a constant so it can be easily changed
